QuestData.Title: Shadra the Venom Queen
QuestData.Description: No time to waste, $n! She's comin' out of the water right now!$B$BGryphon Master Talonaxe is comin' right now with the boys, let's show that bug what for!
QuestData.RewardText: You've done a great thing for the Wildhammer today, $n. I wish Falstad could've been here for that.$B$BOn behalf of the whole clan, I'd like to repay you for keeping these lands free from that foul shadow. You've earned this reward.
